Value.label: Saving state before power failure
Value.Help: Saving state before power failure. Default Not saved.

Item.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to ON upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore

Value.label: Send the basic report
Value.Help: Enable/disable to send the basic report to the Lifeline when the load state changed. When value set as 1, re-power on the dimmer, it will send Basic report automatically. Default Enabled.

Value.label: Fade time
Value.Help: Fade time (units between 1-127 represent 1-127 seconds. Units Between 128-244 represent minutes, 128 = 1 minute, 129 = 2 minutes. This value has the same function as Duration of Multilevel). Default 1.

Value.label: Setting minimum brightness value
Value.Help: Setting minimum brightness value. Valid value: 0 - 50, the bigger the value is, the higher the loads minimum brightness is. Note: when configure this value, the value of Multilevel will be configured as 1 automatically so that users can preview the corresponding effect of minimum brightness value

Value.label: Choose MOSFET driving type
Value.Help: Choose MOSFET driving type". Default trailing edge.

Value.label: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network
Value.Help: Enable/disable external switch to be added to and removed from a network. When enables this function, triple press the external switch within 1.5 seconds to be added to or removed from a net-work. Default Enabled.
